class_notes:
Prerequisites:  Biology 370.
Also taught as IBS 539.
course_description: This course covers ecology and systems biology of species interactions, with a focus on microbial and microbiome ecology including interactions between microbes and their hosts. This course relies heavily on the primary literature, and a basic familiarity with college-level calculus is recommended.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 as prerequisites, and BIOL 370 as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
